author: Tony Boyd
title: Why the tech sector needs a booster shot - The Australian Financial Review
description: Political movers and shakers have been working to help solve the fundamental problems for the sector inherent in the rescue packages for virus-hit businesses.
content:
To qualify for this, a company with less than $1 billion in revenue must have recorded a 30 per cent fall in turnover compared with a year earlier; a company with revenue of more than $1 billion must have turnover decline by 50 per cent.
Andrew Johnson, chai… [+4206 chars]
